summary: Completed initial testing of PGY3-HUB Mind Mapping Tool after React Flow to Cytoscape.js conversion. Fixed critical JavaScript errors that were preventing the application from loading. Application now loads successfully and communicates with backend, but has remaining issues with UI rendering and edge creation.

ui_bugs.issue: UI elements (buttons, sidebar, graph canvas) are not visible after loading
ui_bugs.description: The main interface loads but no interactive elements are visible to the user

ui_bugs.issue: Edge creation failing with nonexistent source node IDs
ui_bugs.error: Can not create edge `edge-0` with nonexistant source `7f8ca947-0887-4794-8dd0-074f8b1be81c`
ui_bugs.description: Edges are being created with node IDs that don't exist in the Cytoscape graph, suggesting ID format mismatch

ui_bugs.error: The style property `box-shadow: 0 0 20px rgba(34, 211, 238, 0.8)` is invalid
ui_bugs.description: CSS styling issue with box-shadow property format

integration_issues.issue: Incomplete conversion - some React Flow references still exist
integration_issues.description: Found and fixed several React Flow function references (setNodes, onNodesChange, convertDataToReactFlow, isReactFlowReady, handleSaveEdgeLabel) but there may be more

design_issues.issue: Main interface not rendering visible elements
design_issues.description: After clicking 'Create New Map', the interface loads but shows no visible buttons, sidebar, or graph canvas

passed_tests: Home screen displays correctly with 'Create New Map' button
'Create New Map' button is clickable and functional
No JavaScript runtime errors preventing app loading
Fixed critical React Flow conversion issues (setNodes, handleSaveEdgeLabel, runLayout hoisting)
action_item_for_main_agent: CRITICAL: Fix UI rendering issue - main dashboard interface loads but no elements are visible to users. Also fix edge creation errors due to node ID mismatches in Cytoscape.js data conversion. The React Flow to Cytoscape.js conversion is partially complete but needs finishing touches for proper UI display and node/edge management.

success_percentage.frontend: 60% - App loads and communicates with backend, but UI elements not visible and edge creation has issues
